tweet.text: George P. Shultz, who turns 100 today, served as U.S. Secretary of State during the 1985 Geneva and 1986 Reykjavik summits between Ronald Reagan and Mikhail Gorbachev. Explore this period in our recently released #FRUS volume: https://t.co/cdGkzuPLYm @Reagan_Library @HooverInst https://t.co/1aOkLBimKp
